title: Quinoa with Oven Sautéed Mushrooms
directions: In a pot, pour the vegetable broth over quinoa, add the salt, cover and let it cook slowly (low flame or first level). Once it starts boiling, let it boil 10 min. Stop the flame/temperature, but leave it covered on the stove for another 5 min.
Chop the fresh dill and stir it in the quinoa, gently. Leave a few leaves for decoration.
Model the quinoa using a metal ring and press slightly using a teaspoon.
Prepare strips of mushrooms, cutting them along. Usually 3 strips out of each mushroom.
Scatter the strips in a pan (glass, ceramic or stainless steel) and sprinkle over them the thyme, basil, vegetable powder, salt, water. Stir gently, to distribute the spices uniformly.
Leave in the oven at 392 degrees F (200 degrees C) for about 15 min, until they slightly soften, but still have a crunchy texture.
Grate or press the garlic, chop the parsley and the red pepper and mix the three, with the fingers. Sprinkle the mixture over the mushrooms and stir in very gently.
Serve next to the quinoa, with a green salad.
ingredients: 1 cup overnight soaked or sprouted quinoa
